name: comorbidity
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's comorbidities. Comorbidities are any distinct entity that has existed or may occur during the clinical course of a patient who has the index disease under study. To submit multiple comorbidities for a single donor, submit multiple rows in the comorbidity file for this donor

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: laterality_of_prior_malignancy
fields.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate laterality of previous diagnosis. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 4122391)

fields.name: age_at_comorbidity_diagnosis
fields.description: Indicate the age of comorbidity diagnosis, in years.

fields.name: comorbidity_type_code
fields.description: Indicate the code for the comorbidity using the WHO ICD-10 code classification (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en).

fields.name: comorbidity_treatment_status
fields.description: Indicate if the patient is being treated for the comorbidity (this includes prior malignancies).

fields.name: comorbidity_treatment
fields.description: Indicate treatment details for the comorbidity (this includes prior malignancies).
